projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern technologies. Features include real-time inventory tracking, secure payment processing, user authentication, admin dashboard, and responsive design.

projects.title: Task Management API
projects.shortDescription: RESTful API for task management with authentication and real-time updates
projects.longDescription: A robust REST API built with Node.js and Express, featuring JWT authentication, WebSocket support for real-time updates, comprehensive validation, and automated testing.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Interactive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts and visualizations
projects.longDescription: A beautiful weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts for any location worldwide. Features interactive maps, historical data visualization, severe weather alerts, and customizable widgets.
